extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    GEOL238 or permission of the Department.
Corequisite    GEOL301.

basic.description: The origin, composition and diagenesis of carbonate rocks. Study of modern carbonate sediments and depositional environments; development of facies models; petrographic and geochemical analysis of limestones and dolostones. Required extended field trip during term.
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Carbonate Sedimentology
